As a student there was a turning point in high school when I realised that the teachers were there to help me succeed. That was certainly one of the best things I learned. I also learned how to concentrate and work hard. Playing inter-school chess helped my concentration. I also.learned the importance of like-minded friends. Friends who wanted, like I did, to get the most out of school to move onto the next phase of our lives.

Personally the best thing I learned was to seek the usefulness in everything. No knowledge, no experience goes to waste. School gives you information, which we apply in every aspect of our lives without knowing it. So school taught me innovation and creativity without teaching me innovation and creativity.
